Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.multiplayer

Class MultiPlayerController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.GameController
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.multiplayer.MultiPlayerController
public class MultiPlayerController
extends GameController
Class Multiplayer controller represents a game controller that manages multiplayer games.

    • MultiPlayerController

      public MultiPlayerController​(Server server)
      Default constructor.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • setCurrentPlayerIndex

      public void setCurrentPlayerIndex​(int currentPlayerIndex)
      Sets the index of the current player.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayerIndex - the index of the current player

    • getCurrentPlayerIndex

      public int getCurrentPlayerIndex()
      Returns the index of the current player.
      Returns:
      the index of the current player

    • changeTurn

      public void changeTurn()
      Ends the turn of the current player and starts the turn of the next player. If the player was the last of the final turn of the game, it calls the endGame() method.

    • sendReloadedView

      public void sendReloadedView​(java.lang.String nickname)
      Send all view elements to a player. Used when a player is trying to reconnect to the game.
      Specified by:
      sendReloadedView in class GameController
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player that is reconnecting to the game

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Returns the current player.
      Returns:
      the current player

    • makeAction

      public void makeAction​(Action action)
      Executes the action performed by the player and sets his actionDone and exclusiveActionDone attributes. It checks if any papal report is triggered and checks if the end game conditions are met.
      Specified by:
      makeAction in class GameController
      Parameters:
      action - the action performed by the player

    • nextPlayer

      private Player nextPlayer()
      Returns the next player.
      Returns:
      the next player

    • checkEndGame

      public void checkEndGame()
      Checks if the end game conditions are met.
      Specified by:
      checkEndGame in class GameController

    • setup

      public void setup()
      Sets the game phase to SETUP, picks a random player as sets him as first. Notifies each player of the development decks and send them a NewPlayers message. It then starts the draw setup phase.
      Specified by:
      setup in class GameController

    • initialDraw

      private void initialDraw()
      Draws four leader cards for the current player and calls the Player.setActionDone(UserAction) method on him.

    • initialDiscardLeader

      public void initialDiscardLeader​(int[] indexes)
      Removes the leader cards from the current player's hand that he has chosen to discard during the draw setup phase.
      Parameters:
      indexes - the index of the two leader cards to discard

    • addInitialResources

      public void addInitialResources​(java.util.List<ResourcePosition> rps)
      Add the initial resources the player has chosen in the setup phase.
      Parameters:
      rps - the resources chosen by the player

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      Computes victory points for every player and sets the game winner, sending a CloseMessage to all players. It then removes this controller from the server.
      Specified by:
      endGame in class GameController
